button.label: Contact
button.tooltip: You must be logged in to contact a carpooler

popup.title: Contact
popup.intro: This proposal does not come from our carpooling site but from the partner site {origin}

instructions.line1: Please complete or modify the message below.
instructions.line2: Remember to leave at least one means of contact, such as your email address and/or telephone number so that the carpooler on the partner site can contact you

content.carpool: Your carpooling between {origin} and {destination} is likely to interest me. We are not registered with the same carpooling network, so I am leaving you my contact details so that we can contact each other
content.name: My name is {name}

return.error: Due to a technical issue the message could not be sent

needTobeConnected: You must be logged in to perform this action.
